paper_abstract: Effective force fields for Ni-C interactions developed by Yamaguchi and Maruyama for the formation of metallofullerenes are modified to simulate the catalyzed growth of single-wall carbon nanotubes on Ni-n clusters with n > 20, and the reactive empirical bond order Brenner potential for C-C interactions is also revised to include the effect of the metal atoms on such interactions.
paper_title: Molecular dynamics study of the initial stages of catalyzed single-wall carbon nanotubes growth: force field development
